element-type.name: ajaxValidator
element-type.description: The &lt;rich:ajaxValidator&gt; is a component designed to provide ajax validation inside for JSF inputs.

attribute-type.name: binding
attribute-type.description: The attribute takes a value-binding expression for a component property of a backing bean

attribute-type.name: ajaxListener
attribute-type.description: MethodExpression representing an action listener method that will be notified when this component is activated by the ajax Request and handle it. The expression must evaluate to a public method that takes an AjaxEvent parameter, with a return type of void. Default value is "null"

attribute-type.name: data
attribute-type.description: Serialized (on default with JSON) data passed on the client by a developer on AJAX request. It's accessible via "data.foo" syntax

attribute-type.name: disableDefault
attribute-type.description: disableDefault

attribute-type.name: event
attribute-type.description: Name of JavaScript event property ( onclick, onchange, etc.) of parent component by which validation will be triggered. Default value is "onblur"

attribute-type.name: eventsQueue
attribute-type.description: Name of requests queue to avoid send next request before complete other from same event. Can be used to reduce number of requests of frequently events (key press, mouse move etc.)

attribute-type.name: focus
attribute-type.description: id of element to set focus after request completed on client side

attribute-type.name: id
attribute-type.description: Every component may have a unique id that is automatically created if omitted

attribute-type.name: ignoreDupResponses
attribute-type.description: Attribute allows to ignore an Ajax Response produced by a request if the newest 'similar' request is in a queue already. ignoreDupResponses="true" does not cancel the request while it is processed on the server, but just allows to avoid unnecessary updates on the client side if the response isn't actual now

attribute-type.name: limitToList
attribute-type.description: If "true", then of all AJAX-rendered on the page components only those will be updated, which ID's are passed to the "reRender" attribute of the describable component. "false"-the default value-means that all components with ajaxRendered="true" will be updated.

attribute-type.name: rendered
attribute-type.description: If "false", this component is not rendered

attribute-type.name: onbeforedomupdate
attribute-type.description: JavaScript code for call before DOM has been updated on client side

attribute-type.name: oncomplete
attribute-type.description: JavaScript code for call after request completed on client side

attribute-type.name: onsubmit
attribute-type.description: JavaScript code for call before submission of ajax event

attribute-type.name: reRender
attribute-type.description: Id['s] (in format of call UIComponent.findComponent()) of components, rendered in case of AjaxRequest caused by this component. Can be single id, comma-separated list of Id's, or EL Expression with array or Collection

attribute-type.name: requestDelay
attribute-type.description: Attribute defines the time (in ms.) that the request will be wait in the queue before it is ready to send. When the delay time is over, the request will be sent to the server or removed if the newest 'similar' request is in a queue already

attribute-type.name: similarityGroupingId
attribute-type.description: If there are any component requests with identical IDs then these requests will be grouped.

attribute-type.name: status
attribute-type.description: ID (in format of call UIComponent.findComponent()) of Request status component

attribute-type.name: summary
attribute-type.description: Summary message for a validation errors.

attribute-type.name: timeout
attribute-type.description: Response waiting time on a particular request. If a response is not received during this time, the request is aborted

element-type.name: extendedDataTable
element-type.description: The &lt;rich:extendedDataTable&gt; component is used for tables extending standard component &lt;rich:dataTable&gt; .

attribute-type.name: ajaxKeys
attribute-type.description: This attribute defines row keys that are updated after an AJAX request

attribute-type.name: align
attribute-type.description:
left|center|right [CI] Deprecated. This attribute specifies the position of the table with respect to the document. Permitted values:
* left: The table is to the left of the document. * center: The table is to the center of the document. * right: The table is to the right of the document

attribute-type.name: bgcolor
attribute-type.description:
Deprecated. This attribute sets the background color for the document body or table cells.
This attribute sets the background color of the canvas for the document body (the BODY element) or for tables (the TABLE, TR, TH, and TD elements). Additional attributes for specifying text color can be used with the BODY element.
This attribute has been deprecated in favor of style sheets for specifying background color information

attribute-type.name: binding
attribute-type.description: The attribute takes a value-binding expression for a component property of a backing bean

attribute-type.name: border
attribute-type.description: This attributes specifies the width of the frame around a component. Default value is "0".

attribute-type.name: captionClass
attribute-type.description: Space-separated list of CSS style class(es) that are be applied to caption for this component

attribute-type.name: captionStyle
attribute-type.description: CSS style(s) is/are to be applied to caption when this component is rendered

attribute-type.name: cellpadding
attribute-type.description: This attribute specifies the amount of space between the border of the cell and its contents. Default value is "0".

attribute-type.name: cellspacing
attribute-type.description: This attribute specifies the amount of space between the border of the cell and its contents. The attribute also specifies the amount of space to leave between cells. Default value is "0".

attribute-type.name: columnClasses
attribute-type.description: Comma-delimited list of CSS style classes that are be applied to the columns of this table. A space separated list of classes may also be specified for any individual column. If the number of elements in this list is less than the number of columns specified in the "columns" attribute, no "class" attribute is output for each column greater than the number of elements in the list. If the number of elements in the list is greater than the number of columns specified in the "columns" attribute, the elements at the position in the list after the value of the "columns" attribute are ignored

attribute-type.name: columns
attribute-type.description: Number of columns

attribute-type.name: columnsWidth
attribute-type.description: Comma-separated list of width attribute for every column. Specifies a default width for each column in the table. In addition to the standard pixel, percentage, and relative values, this attribute allows the special form "0*" (zero asterisk) which means that the width of the each column in the group should be the minimum width necessary to hold the column's contents. This implies that a column's entire contents must be known before its width may be correctly computed. Authors should be aware that specifying "0*" will prevent visual user agents from rendering a table incrementally

attribute-type.name: componentState
attribute-type.description: It defines EL-binding for a component state for saving or redefinition

attribute-type.name: dir
attribute-type.description: Direction indication for text that does not inherit directionality. Valid values are "LTR" (left-to-right) and "RTL" (right-to-left)

attribute-type.name: first
attribute-type.description: A zero-relative row number of the first row to display

attribute-type.name: footerClass
attribute-type.description: Space-separated list of CSS style class(es) that are be applied to footer for this component

attribute-type.name: frame
attribute-type.description:
void|above|below|hsides|lhs|rhs|vsides|box|border [CI] This attribute specifies which sides of the frame surrounding a table will be visible. Possible values:
* void: No sides. This is the default value. * above: The top side only. * below: The bottom side only. * hsides: The top and bottom sides only. * vsides: The right and left sides only. * lhs: The left-hand side only. * rhs: The right-hand side only. * box: All four sides. * border: All four sides

attribute-type.name: headerClass
attribute-type.description: Space-separated list of CSS style class(es) that are be applied to header for this component

attribute-type.name: id
attribute-type.description: Every component may have a unique id that is automatically created if omitted

attribute-type.name: lang
attribute-type.description: Code describing the language used in the generated markup for this component

attribute-type.name: onRowContextMenu
attribute-type.description: JavaScript handler to be called on right click. Returning false prevents default browser context menu from being displayed

attribute-type.name: onRowClick
attribute-type.description: HTML: a script expression; a pointer button is clicked on row

attribute-type.name: onRowDblClick
attribute-type.description: HTML: a script expression; a pointer button is double-clicked on row

attribute-type.name: onRowMouseDown
attribute-type.description: HTML: script expression; a pointer button is pressed down on row

attribute-type.name: onRowMouseMove
attribute-type.description: HTML: a script expression; a pointer is moved within of row

attribute-type.name: onRowMouseOut
attribute-type.description: HTML: a script expression; a pointer is moved away of row

attribute-type.name: onRowMouseOver
attribute-type.description: HTML: a script expression; a pointer is moved onto of row

attribute-type.name: onRowMouseUp
attribute-type.description: HTML: script expression; a pointer button is released on row

attribute-type.name: onclick
attribute-type.description: HTML: a script expression; a pointer button is clicked

attribute-type.name: ondblclick
attribute-type.description: HTML: a script expression; a pointer button is double-clicked

attribute-type.name: onkeydown
attribute-type.description: HTML: a script expression; a key is pressed down

attribute-type.name: onkeypress
attribute-type.description: HTML: a script expression; a key is pressed and released

attribute-type.name: onkeyup
attribute-type.description: HTML: a script expression; a key is released

attribute-type.name: onmousedown
attribute-type.description: HTML: script expression; a pointer button is pressed down

attribute-type.name: onmousemove
attribute-type.description: HTML: a script expression; a pointer is moved within

attribute-type.name: onmouseout
attribute-type.description: HTML: a script expression; a pointer is moved away

attribute-type.name: onmouseover
attribute-type.description: HTML: a script expression; a pointer is moved onto

attribute-type.name: onmouseup
attribute-type.description: HTML: script expression; a pointer button is released

attribute-type.name: rendered
attribute-type.description: If "false", this component is not rendered

attribute-type.name: rowClasses
attribute-type.description: A comma-delimited list of CSS style classes that is applied to popup table rows. A space separated list of classes may also be specified for any individual row. The styles are applied, in turn, to each row in the table. For example, if the list has two elements, the first style class in the list is applied to the first row, the second to the second row, the first to the third row, the second to the fourth row, etc. In other words, we keep iterating through the list until we reach the end, and then we start at the beginning again

attribute-type.name: rowKeyConverter
attribute-type.description: Converter for a RowKey object.

attribute-type.name: rowKeyVar
attribute-type.description: The attribute provides access to a row key in a Request scope

attribute-type.name: rows
attribute-type.description: A number of rows to display, or zero for all remaining rows in the table

attribute-type.name: rules
attribute-type.description:
This attribute specifies which rules will appear between cells within a table. The rendering of rules is user agent dependent. Possible values:
* none: No rules. This is the default value. * groups: Rules will appear between row groups (see THEAD, TFOOT, and TBODY) and column groups (see COLGROUP and COL) only. * rows: Rules will appear between rows only. * cols: Rules will appear between columns only. * all: Rules will appear between all rows and columns

attribute-type.name: sortMode
attribute-type.description: Defines mode of sorting. Possible values are 'single' for sorting of one column and 'multi' for some.

attribute-type.name: sortPriority
attribute-type.description: Defines a set of columns ids in the sorting order

attribute-type.name: stateVar
attribute-type.description: The attribute provides access to a component state on the client side

attribute-type.name: style
attribute-type.description: CSS style(s) is/are to be applied when this component is rendered

attribute-type.name: styleClass
attribute-type.description: Corresponds to the HTML class attribute

attribute-type.name: title
attribute-type.description: Advisory title information about markup elements generated for this component

attribute-type.name: value
attribute-type.description: The current value for this component

attribute-type.name: var
attribute-type.description: A request-scope attribute via which the data object for the current row will be used when iterating

attribute-type.name: width
attribute-type.description: This attribute specifies the desired width of the entire table and is intended for visual user agents. When the value is percentage value, the value is relative to the user agent's available horizontal space. In the absence of any width specification, table width is determined by the user agent

attribute-type.name: activeClass
attribute-type.description: CSS class for active row

attribute-type.name: activeRowKey
attribute-type.description: Request scope attribute under which the activeRowKey will be accessible

attribute-type.name: groupingColumn
attribute-type.description: Defines an id of column which the data is grouped by.

attribute-type.name: height
attribute-type.description: Defines a height of the component. Default value is "500px"

attribute-type.name: onselectionchange
attribute-type.description: HTML: script expression to invoke on changing of rows selection

attribute-type.name: selectedClass
attribute-type.description: CSS class for selected rows

attribute-type.name: selection
attribute-type.description: Value binding representing selected rows

attribute-type.name: selectionMode
attribute-type.description: Single row can be selected. multi: Multiple rows can be selected. none: no rows can be selected. Default value is "single"

attribute-type.name: tableState
attribute-type.description: ValueBinding pointing at a property of a String to hold table state

element-type.name: beanValidator
element-type.description: Validate Input by the Bean/Hibernate validator annotations.

attribute-type.name: binding
attribute-type.description: A ValueExpression that evaluates to an instance of FacesBeanValidator.

attribute-type.name: summary
attribute-type.description: Summary message for a validation errors.

attribute-type.name: id
attribute-type.description: Every component may have a unique id that is automatically created if omitted

attribute-type.name: rendered
attribute-type.description: If "false", this component is not rendered

element-type.name: graphValidator
element-type.description: Bean validation @ and @validation support.

attribute-type.name: binding
attribute-type.description: The attribute takes a value-binding expression for a component property of a backing bean

attribute-type.name: id
attribute-type.description: Every component may have a unique id that is automatically created if omitted

attribute-type.name: profile
attribute-type.description: This attribute is reserved till the implementation of JavaBean Validation feature (JSR-303).

attribute-type.name: summary
attribute-type.description: Summary message for a validation errors.

attribute-type.name: type
attribute-type.description: JSF Validator type, that implements GraphValidator interface.This validator is used for the Graph and input fields validation.

attribute-type.name: value
attribute-type.description: The current value of this component

element-type.name: hotKey
element-type.description: The &lt;rich:hotKey&gt; component allows to register hot keys for the page or particular elements and to define client side processing functions for these keys.

attribute-type.name: binding
attribute-type.description: The attribute takes a value-binding expression for a component property of a backing bean

attribute-type.name: id
attribute-type.description: Every component may have a unique id that is automatically created if omitted

attribute-type.name: checkParent
attribute-type.description: Defines the hotkey handling of events generated by child components nested into the parent component to which the <rich:hotKey> is attached.

attribute-type.name: disableInInput
attribute-type.description: Disables the hotkeys activated on input elements when the value of this attribute is "true".

attribute-type.name: disableInInputTypes
attribute-type.description: Defines the types of the inputs not to be influenced with hotKey component. Possible values: buttons, texts and all (default). By default it is empty and this means ALL the types.

attribute-type.name: handler
attribute-type.description: Defines the JavaScript function name which is called on hotkey activation

attribute-type.name: key
attribute-type.description: Defines the hotkey itself

attribute-type.name: rendered
attribute-type.description: If "false", this component is not rendered

attribute-type.name: selector
attribute-type.description: Defines a selector for query

attribute-type.name: timing
attribute-type.description: Defines the time when the hotkey is registered. Possible values are "immediate" (by default), "onload", and "onregistercall". Default value is "immediate"

attribute-type.name: type
attribute-type.description: Defines the type of a keyboard event (onkeyup, onkeypress, etc.)

element-type.name: calendar
element-type.description: The calendar component is a UI control used for creating graphical monthly calendar on a page.

attribute-type.name: ajaxSingle
attribute-type.description: boolean attribute which provides possibility to limit JSF tree processing(decoding, conversion/validation, value applying) to the component which send the request only.

attribute-type.name: binding
attribute-type.description: The attribute takes a value-binding expression for a component property of a backing bean

attribute-type.name: boundaryDatesMode
attribute-type.description: Used for the dates boundaries in the list. Valid values are "inactive" (Default) dates inactive and gray colored, "scroll" boundaries work as month scrolling controls, and "select" boundaries work in the same way as "scroll" but with the date clicked selection. Default value is "inactive".

attribute-type.name: buttonClass
attribute-type.description: Style Class attribute for the popup button

attribute-type.name: buttonIcon
attribute-type.description: Defines icon for the popup button element. The attribute is ignored if the "buttonLabel" is set

attribute-type.name: buttonIconDisabled
attribute-type.description: Defines disabled icon for the popup button element. The attribute is ignored if the "buttonLabel" is set

attribute-type.name: buttonLabel
attribute-type.description: Defines label for the popup button element. If the attribute is set "buttonIcon" and "buttonIconDisabled" are ignored

attribute-type.name: bypassUpdates
attribute-type.description: If "true", after process validations phase it skips updates of model beans on a force render response. It can be used for validating components input

attribute-type.name: cellHeight
attribute-type.description: attribute to set fixed cells height

attribute-type.name: cellWidth
attribute-type.description: attribute to set fixed cells width

attribute-type.name: converter
attribute-type.description: Id of Converter to be used or reference to a Converter

attribute-type.name: converterMessage
attribute-type.description: A ValueExpression enabled attribute that, if present, will be used as the text of the converter message, replacing any message that comes from the converter

attribute-type.name: currentDate
attribute-type.description: Defines current date

attribute-type.name: currentDateChangeListener
attribute-type.description: MethodBinding representing an action listener method that will be notified after date selection

attribute-type.name: dataModel
attribute-type.description: Used to provide data for calendar elements. If data is not provided, all Data Model related functions are disabled

attribute-type.name: datePattern
attribute-type.description: Defines date pattern. Default value is "MMM d, yyyy".

attribute-type.name: dayStyleClass
attribute-type.description: Should be binded to some JS function that will provide style classes for special sets of days highlighting.

attribute-type.name: defaultTime
attribute-type.description: Defines time that will be used: 1) to set time when the value is empty 2) to set time when date changes and flag "resetTimeOnDateSelect" is true

attribute-type.name: direction
attribute-type.description: Defines direction of the calendar popup (top-left, top-right, bottom-left, bottom-right (Default), auto). Default value is "bottom-right".

attribute-type.name: disabled
attribute-type.description: If "true", rendered is disabled. In "popup" mode both controls are disabled. Default value is "false".

attribute-type.name: enableManualInput
attribute-type.description: If "true" calendar input will be editable and it will be possible to change the date manualy. If "false" value for this attribute makes a text field "read-only", so the value can be changed only from a handle. Default value is "false".

attribute-type.name: eventsQueue
attribute-type.description: Name of requests queue to avoid send next request before complete other from same event. Can be used to reduce number of requests of frequently events (key press, mouse move etc.)

attribute-type.name: firstWeekDay
attribute-type.description: Gets what the first day of the week is; e.g., SUNDAY in the U.S., MONDAY in France. Default value is "getDefaultFirstWeekDay()".

attribute-type.name: focus
attribute-type.description: id of element to set focus after request completed on client side

attribute-type.name: horizontalOffset
attribute-type.description: Sets the horizontal offset between button and calendar element conjunction point. Default value is "0".

attribute-type.name: id
attribute-type.description: Every component may have a unique id that is automatically created if omitted

attribute-type.name: ignoreDupResponses
attribute-type.description: Attribute allows to ignore an Ajax Response produced by a request if the newest 'similar' request is in a queue already. ignoreDupResponses="true" does not cancel the request while it is processed on the server, but just allows to avoid unnecessary updates on the client side if the response isn't actual now

attribute-type.name: immediate
attribute-type.description: A flag indicating that this component value must be converted and validated immediately (that is, during Apply Request Values phase), rather than waiting until a Process Validations phase

attribute-type.name: inputClass
attribute-type.description: Style Class attribute for the text field

attribute-type.name: inputSize
attribute-type.description: Defines the size of an input field. Similar to the "size" attribute of <h:inputText/>

attribute-type.name: inputStyle
attribute-type.description: Style attribute for text field

attribute-type.name: isDayEnabled
attribute-type.description: Should be binded to some JS function that returns day state.

attribute-type.name: jointPoint
attribute-type.description: Set the corner of the button for the popup to be connected with (top-left, top-right, bottom-left (Default), bottom-right, auto). Default value is "bottom-left".

attribute-type.name: label
attribute-type.description: A localized user presentable name for this component.

attribute-type.name: limitToList
attribute-type.description: If "true", updates on client side ONLY elements from this 'reRender' property. If "false" (default) updates all rendered by ajax region components

attribute-type.name: locale
attribute-type.description: Used for locale definition. Default value is "getDefaultLocale()".

attribute-type.name: minDaysInFirstWeek
attribute-type.description: Gets what the minimal days required in the first week of the year are; e.g., if the first week is defined as one that contains the first day of the first month of a year, this method returns 1. If the minimal days required must be a full week, this method returns 7. Default value is "getDefaultMinDaysInFirstWeek()".

attribute-type.name: mode
attribute-type.description: Valid values: ajax or client. Default value is "client".

attribute-type.name: monthLabels
attribute-type.description: Attribute that allows to customize names of the months. Should accept list with the month names

attribute-type.name: monthLabelsShort
attribute-type.description: Attribute that allows to customize short names of the months. Should accept list with the month names

attribute-type.name: onbeforedomupdate
attribute-type.description: JavaScript code for call before DOM has been updated on client side

attribute-type.name: onchanged
attribute-type.description: onChanged event handler

attribute-type.name: oncollapse
attribute-type.description: onCollapse event handler

attribute-type.name: oncomplete
attribute-type.description: JavaScript code for call after request completed on client side

attribute-type.name: oncurrentdateselect
attribute-type.description: onCurrentDateSelect event handler

attribute-type.name: oncurrentdateselected
attribute-type.description: onCurrentDateSelected event handler

attribute-type.name: ondatemouseout
attribute-type.description: onDateMouseOut event handler

attribute-type.name: ondatemouseover
attribute-type.description: onDateMouseOver event handler

attribute-type.name: ondateselect
attribute-type.description: onDateSelect event handler

attribute-type.name: ondateselected
attribute-type.description: onDateSelected event handler

attribute-type.name: onexpand
attribute-type.description: onExpand event handler

attribute-type.name: oninputblur
attribute-type.description: input onBlur event handler

attribute-type.name: oninputchange
attribute-type.description: input onChange event handler

attribute-type.name: oninputclick
attribute-type.description: input onClick event handler

attribute-type.name: oninputfocus
attribute-type.description: input onFocus event handler

attribute-type.name: oninputkeydown
attribute-type.description: input onKeyDown event handler

attribute-type.name: oninputkeypress
attribute-type.description: input onKeyPress event handler

attribute-type.name: oninputkeyup
attribute-type.description: input onKeyUp event handler

attribute-type.name: oninputselect
attribute-type.description: input onSelect event handler

attribute-type.name: ontimeselect
attribute-type.description: onTimeSelect event handler

attribute-type.name: ontimeselected
attribute-type.description: onTimeSelected event handler

attribute-type.name: popup
attribute-type.description: If "true" calendar will be rendered initially as hidden with additional elements for calling as popup. Default value is "true".

attribute-type.name: preloadDateRangeBegin
attribute-type.description: Define the initial range of date which will be loaded to client from dataModel under rendering. Default value is "getDefaultPreloadBegin(getCurrentDateOrDefault())".

attribute-type.name: preloadDateRangeEnd
attribute-type.description: Defines the last range of date which will be loaded to client from dataModel under rendering. Default value is "getDefaultPreloadEnd(getCurrentDateOrDefault())".

attribute-type.name: process
attribute-type.description: Id['s] (in format of call UIComponent.findComponent()) of components, processed at the phases 2-5 in case of AjaxRequest caused by this component. Can be single id, comma-separated list of Id's, or EL Expression with array or Collection

attribute-type.name: reRender
attribute-type.description: Id['s] (in format of call UIComponent.findComponent()) of components, rendered in case of AjaxRequest caused by this component. Can be single id, comma-separated list of Id's, or EL Expression with array or Collection

attribute-type.name: rendered
attribute-type.description: If "false", this component is not rendered

attribute-type.name: requestDelay
attribute-type.description: Attribute defines the time (in ms.) that the request will be wait in the queue before it is ready to send. When the delay time is over, the request will be sent to the server or removed if the newest 'similar' request is in a queue already

attribute-type.name: required
attribute-type.description: If "true", this component is checked for non-empty input

attribute-type.name: requiredMessage
attribute-type.description: A ValueExpression enabled attribute that, if present, will be used as the text of the validation message for the "required" facility, if the "required" facility is used

attribute-type.name: resetTimeOnDateSelect
attribute-type.description: If value is true then calendar should change time to defaultTime for newly-selected dates.

attribute-type.name: showApplyButton
attribute-type.description: If false ApplyButton should not be shown. Default value is "false".

attribute-type.name: showFooter
attribute-type.description: If false Calendar's footer should not be shown. Default value is "true".

attribute-type.name: showHeader
attribute-type.description: If false Calendar's header should not be shown. Default value is "true".

attribute-type.name: showInput
attribute-type.description: "false" value for this attribute makes text field invisible. If "true" - input field will be shown. Default value is "true".

attribute-type.name: showWeekDaysBar
attribute-type.description: If false this bar should not be shown. Default value is "true".

attribute-type.name: showWeeksBar
attribute-type.description: If false this bar should not be shown. Default value is "true".

attribute-type.name: status
attribute-type.description: ID (in format of call UIComponent.findComponent()) of Request status component

attribute-type.name: style
attribute-type.description: CSS style(s) is/are to be applied when this component is rendered

attribute-type.name: styleClass
attribute-type.description: Corresponds to the HTML class attribute

attribute-type.name: timeZone
attribute-type.description: Used for current date calculations. Default value is "getDefaultTimeZone()".

attribute-type.name: timeout
attribute-type.description: Response waiting time on a particular request. If a response is not received during this time, the request is aborted

attribute-type.name: todayControlMode
attribute-type.description: Possible values are "scroll", "select", "hidden". Default value is "select".

attribute-type.name: toolTipMode
attribute-type.description: Used to specify mode to load tooltips. Valid values are "none", "single" and "batch" Default value is "batch".

attribute-type.name: validator
attribute-type.description: MethodBinding pointing at a method that is called during Process Validations phase of the request processing lifecycle, to validate the current value of this component

attribute-type.name: validatorMessage
attribute-type.description: A ValueExpression enabled attribute that, if present, will be used as the text of the validator message, replacing any message that comes from the validator

attribute-type.name: value
attribute-type.description: The current value of this component

attribute-type.name: valueChangeListener
attribute-type.description: Listener for value changes

attribute-type.name: verticalOffset
attribute-type.description: Sets the vertical offset between button and calendar element conjunction point. Default value is "0".

attribute-type.name: weekDayLabels
attribute-type.description: List of the day names displays on the days bar in the following way "Sun, Mon, Tue, Wed, "

attribute-type.name: weekDayLabelsShort
attribute-type.description: Attribute that allows to customize short names of the weeks. Should accept list with the weeks names.

attribute-type.name: zindex
attribute-type.description: Attribute is similar to the standard HTML attribute and can specify window placement relative to the content. Default value is "3".

attribute-type.name: readonly
attribute-type.description: If "true". Date and time are not selectable. In "popup" mode input is disabled and button is enabled. Default value is "false".

attribute-type.name: similarityGroupingId

attribute-type.description: The handleStyleClass for a handle

attribute-type.name: handleValue
attribute-type.description: Current handle value

attribute-type.name: id
attribute-type.description: Every component may have a unique id that is automatically created if omitted

attribute-type.name: ignoreDupResponses
attribute-type.description: Attribute allows to ignore an Ajax Response produced by a request if the newest 'similar' request is in a queue already. ignoreDupResponses="true" does not cancel the request while it is processed on the server, but just allows to avoid unnecessary updates on the client side if the response isn't actual now

attribute-type.name: immediate
attribute-type.description: True means, that the default ActionListener should be executed immediately (i.e. during Apply Request Values phase of the request processing lifecycle), rather than waiting until the Invoke Application phase

attribute-type.name: increment
attribute-type.description: Amount to which a handle on each slide/move should be incremented

attribute-type.name: limitToList
attribute-type.description: If "true", updates on client side ONLY elements from this 'reRender' property. If "false" (default) updates all rendered by ajax region components

attribute-type.name: manualInput
attribute-type.description: False value for this attribute makes text field "read-only" and "hidden". Hence, the value can be changed only from a handle

attribute-type.name: onSlideSubmit
attribute-type.description: DEPRECATED (use submitOnSlide). If the slider value changes must submit a form. Default value is "true".

attribute-type.name: onbeforedomupdate
attribute-type.description: JavaScript code for call before DOM has been updated on client side

attribute-type.name: onchange
attribute-type.description: Event occur on chage

attribute-type.name: onclick
attribute-type.description: HTML: a script expression; a pointer button is clicked

attribute-type.name: oncomplete
attribute-type.description: JavaScript code for call after request completed on client side

attribute-type.name: ondblclick
attribute-type.description: HTML: a script expression; a pointer button is double-clicked

attribute-type.name: onerror
attribute-type.description: HTML: a script expression; event fires whenever an JavaScript error occurs

attribute-type.name: onkeydown
attribute-type.description: HTML: a script expression; a key is pressed down

attribute-type.name: onkeypress
attribute-type.description: HTML: a script expression; a key is pressed and released

attribute-type.name: onkeyup
attribute-type.description: HTML: a script expression; a key is released

attribute-type.name: onmousedown
attribute-type.description: HTML: script expression; a pointer button is pressed down

attribute-type.name: onmousemove
attribute-type.description: HTML: a script expression; a pointer is moved within

attribute-type.name: onmouseout
attribute-type.description: HTML: a script expression; a pointer is moved away

attribute-type.description: HTML: a script expression; a pointer is moved onto

attribute-type.name: onmouseup
attribute-type.description: HTML: script expression; a pointer button is released

attribute-type.name: onslide
attribute-type.description: Event occur on sliding

attribute-type.name: process
attribute-type.description: Id['s] (in format of call UIComponent.findComponent()) of components, processed at the phases 2-5 in case of AjaxRequest caused by this component. Can be single id, comma-separated list of Id's, or EL Expression with array or Collection

attribute-type.name: rangeStyleClass
attribute-type.description: The rangeStyleClass for the background div showing a full range

attribute-type.name: reRender

attribute-type.name: rendered
attribute-type.description: If "false", this component is not rendered

attribute-type.name: requestDelay
attribute-type.description: Attribute defines the time (in ms.) that the request will be wait in the queue before it is ready to send. When the delay time is over, the request will be sent to the server or removed if the newest 'similar' request is in a queue already

attribute-type.name: sliderListener
attribute-type.description: MethodBinding representing an action listener method that will be notified after changing of slider control position

attribute-type.name: startRange
attribute-type.description: A slider begin point

attribute-type.name: status
attribute-type.description: ID (in format of call UIComponent.findComponent()) of Request status component

attribute-type.name: storeResults

Deprecated. This attribute sets the background color for the document body or table cells.
This attribute sets the background color of the canvas for the document body (the BODY element) or for tables (the TABLE, TR, TH, and TD elements). Additional attributes for specifying text color can be used with the BODY element.
This attribute has been deprecated in favor of style sheets for specifying background color information

attribute-type.name: cellpadding
attribute-type.description: This attribute specifies the amount of space between the border of the cell and its contents. Default value is "0".

attribute-type.name: cellspacing
attribute-type.description: This attribute specifies the amount of space between the border of the cell and its contents. The attribute also specifies the amount of space to leave between cells. Default value is "0".

attribute-type.name: columnClasses
attribute-type.description: Comma-delimited list of CSS style classes that are be applied to the columns of this table. A space separated list of classes may also be specified for any individual column. If the number of elements in this list is less than the number of columns specified in the "columns" attribute, no "class" attribute is output for each column greater than the number of elements in the list. If the number of elements in the list is greater than the number of columns specified in the "columns" attribute, the elements at the position in the list after the value of the "columns" attribute are ignored

attribute-type.description: A comma-delimited list of CSS style classes that is applied to popup table rows. A space separated list of classes may also be specified for any individual row. The styles are applied, in turn, to each row in the table. For example, if the list has two elements, the first style class in the list is applied to the first row, the second to the second row, the first to the third row, the second to the fourth row, etc. In other words, we keep iterating through the list until we reach the end, and then we start at the beginning again

attribute-type.name: rules
attribute-type.description:
This attribute specifies which rules will appear between cells within a table. The rendering of rules is user agent dependent. Possible values:
* none: No rules. This is the default value. * groups: Rules will appear between row groups (see THEAD, TFOOT, and TBODY) and column groups (see COLGROUP and COL) only. * rows: Rules will appear between rows only. * cols: Rules will appear between columns only. * all: Rules will appear between all rows and columns

This implies that a column's entire contents must be known before its width may be correctly computed. Authors should be aware that specifying "0*" will prevent visual user agents from rendering a table incrementally

attribute-type.description: If "true", after process validations phase it skips updates of model beans on a force render response. It can be used for validating components input

attribute-type.name: data
attribute-type.description: Serialized (on default with JSON) data passed on the client by a developer on AJAX request. It's accessible via "data.foo" syntax

attribute-type.name: eventsQueue
attribute-type.description: Name of requests queue to avoid send next request before complete other from same event. Can be used to reduce number of requests of frequently events (key press, mouse move etc.)

attribute-type.name: fastControls
attribute-type.description: The attribute specifies the visibility of fastControls. Possible values are: "show" (controls are always visible ). "hide" (controls are hidden. "auto" (unnecessary controls are hidden). Default value is "show".

attribute-type.name: fastStep
attribute-type.description: The attribute indicates pages quantity to switch onto when fast scrolling is used. Default value is "0".

attribute-type.description: id of element to set focus after request completed on client side

attribute-type.name: id

attribute-type.description: Attribute allows to ignore an Ajax Response produced by a request if the newest 'similar' request is in a queue already. ignoreDupResponses="true" does not cancel the request while it is processed on the server, but just allows to avoid unnecessary updates on the client side if the response isn't actual now. attribute-type.description: Enables continuous smooth zooming for selected browsers. Default value is "false".

attribute-type.description: Enables a map dragging with the mouse. Default value is "true".

attribute-type.description: Google Map key. A single Map API key is valid for a single "directory" on your web server. Default value is "internal".

attribute-type.name: align
attribute-type.description:
bottom|middle|top|left|right Deprecated. This attribute specifies the position of an IMG, OBJECT, or APPLET with respect to its context.
The following values for align concern the object's position with respect to surrounding text:
* bottom: means that the bottom of the object should be vertically aligned with the current baseline. This is the default value. * middle: means that the center of the object should be vertically aligned with the current baseline. * top: means that the top of the object should be vertically aligned with the top of the current text line

attribute-type.name: bgcolor
attribute-type.description: Background color of painted image. Default value is 'transparent' which means no background fill. Hex colors can be used, as well as common color names. Invalid values are treated as transparent. Note, that JPEG format doesn't support transparency, and transparent background is painted black. Also note, that several browsers (e.g. IE6) do not support PNG transparency

attribute-type.name: rowClasses
attribute-type.description: A comma-delimited list of CSS style classes that is applied to popup table rows. A space separated list of classes may also be specified for any individual row. The styles are applied, in turn, to each row in the table. For example, if the list has two elements, the first style class in the list is applied to the first row, the second to the second row, the first to the third row, the second to the fourth row, etc. In other words, we keep iterating through the list until we reach the end, and then we start at the beginning again

attribute-type.name: rowKeyConverter
attribute-type.description: Converter for a row key object

attribute-type.name: rowKeyVar
attribute-type.description: The attribute provides access to a row key in a Request scope

attribute-type.name: rows
attribute-type.description: A number of rows to display, or zero for all remaining rows in the table

attribute-type.name: selfSorted
attribute-type.description: Manages if the header of the column is clickable, icons rendered and sorting is fired after click on the header. You need to define this attribute inside <rich:dataTable> component. Default value is "true".

attribute-type.name: sortExpression
attribute-type.description: DEPRECATED(use sortBy)Attribute defines a bean property which is used for sorting of a column

attribute-type.name: sortMode
attribute-type.description: Defines mode of sorting. Possible values are 'single' for sorting of one column and 'multi' for some.

attribute-type.name: sortOrder
attribute-type.description: SortOrder is an enumeration of the possible sort orderings. Default value is "Ordering.UNSORTED".

attribute-type.name: sortPriority
attribute-type.description: Defines a set of column ids in the order the columns could be set

attribute-type.name: stateVar
attribute-type.description: The attribute provides access to a component state on the client side

attribute-type.name: value
attribute-type.description: The current value for this component

attribute-type.name: var
attribute-type.description: A request-scope attribute via which the data object for the current row will be used when iterating

element-type.name: suggestionbox
element-type.description: This element adds "on-keypress" suggestions capabilites to any input text component (like <h:inputText>). It creates a pop-up window for a input field component pointed to by the "for" attribute. For an ordinary request, render a hidden HTML <div> element and the necessary JavaScript code. When input to the target field exceeds the "minChars" property (default is 1), perform an AJAX request with the value current entered. If the AJAX request is detected and the request parameters map contains the client ID of this component, call a method defined by suggestionAction, and use it to return a value as data for render table, same as <h:dataTable>. In this case, the component then works the same as an ordinary dataTable. The rendered table is inserted in the pop-up area and is used for suggestion prompts for input element. If a user clicks on such a table row, its text (or value defined by fetchValue) is inserted as the value of the input field.

attribute-type.name: ajaxSingle
attribute-type.description: Boolean attribute which provides possibility to limit JSF tree processing(decoding, conversion/validation, value applying) to the component which send the request only.

attribute-type.name: bgcolor
attribute-type.description:
Deprecated. This attribute sets the background color for the document body or table cells.
This attribute sets the background color of the canvas for the document body (the BODY element) or for tables (the TABLE, TR, TH, and TD elements). Additional attributes for specifying text color can be used with the BODY element.
This attribute has been deprecated in favor of style sheets for specifying background color information

attribute-type.name: binding
attribute-type.description: The attribute takes a value-binding expression for a component property of a backing bean

attribute-type.name: border
attribute-type.description: This attributes specifies the width (in pixels only) of the frame around a table

attribute-type.name: bypassUpdates
attribute-type.description: If "true", after process validations phase it skips updates of model beans on a force render response. It can be used for validating components input

attribute-type.name: cellpadding
attribute-type.description: This attribute specifies the amount of space between the border of the cell and its contents. If the value of this attribute is a pixel length, all four margins should be this distance from the contents. If the value of the attribute is percentage length, the top and bottom margins should be equally separated from the content based on percentage of the available vertical space, and the left and right margins should be equally separated from the content based on percentage of the available horizontal space

attribute-type.name: cellspacing
attribute-type.description: This attribute specifies how much space the user agent should leave between the table and the column on all four sides. The attribute also specifies the amount of space to leave between cells

attribute-type.name: converter
attribute-type.description: Id of Converter to be used or reference to a Converter

attribute-type.name: dir
attribute-type.description: Direction indication for text that does not inherit directionality. Valid values are "LTR" (left-to-right) and "RTL" (right-to-left)

attribute-type.name: entryClass
attribute-type.description: Name of the CSS class for a suggestion entry element. (table row)

attribute-type.name: eventsQueue
attribute-type.description: Name of requests queue to avoid send next request before complete other from same event. Can be used to reduce number of requests of frequently events (key press, mouse move etc.)

attribute-type.name: fetchValue
attribute-type.description: A value to set in the target input element on a choice suggestion that isn't shown in the suggestion table. It can be used for descriptive output comments or suggestions. If not set, all text in the suggestion row is set as a value

attribute-type.name: first
attribute-type.description: A zero-relative row number of the first row to display

attribute-type.name: focus
attribute-type.description: id of element to set focus after request completed on client side

attribute-type.name: for
attribute-type.description: id (or full path of id's) of target components, for which this element must provide support. If a target component inside of the same <code>NamingContainer</code> (UIForm, UIData in base implementations), can be simple value of the "id" attribute. For other cases must include id's of <code>NamingContainer</code> components, separated by ':'. For search from the root of components, must be started with ':'.

attribute-type.name: frame
attribute-type.description:
void|above|below|hsides|lhs|rhs|vsides|box|border [CI] This attribute specifies which sides of the frame surrounding a table will be visible. Possible values:
* void: No sides. This is the default value. * above: The top side only. * below: The bottom side only. * hsides: The top and bottom sides only. * vsides: The right and left sides only. * lhs: The left-hand side only. * rhs: The right-hand side only. * box: All four sides. * border: All four sides

attribute-type.name: frequency
attribute-type.description: Delay (in seconds) before activating the suggestion pop-up

attribute-type.name: height
attribute-type.description: Height of the pop-up window in pixels. Default value is "200".

attribute-type.name: id

attribute-type.description: Attribute allows to ignore an Ajax Response produced by a request if the newest 'similar' request is in a queue already. ignoreDupResponses="true" does not cancel the request while it is processed on the server, but just allows to avoid unnecessary updates on the client side if the response isn't actual now

attribute-type.name: immediate
attribute-type.description: A flag indicating that this component value must be converted and validated immediately (that is, during Apply Request Values phase), rather than waiting until a Process Validations phase.

attribute-type.name: lang
attribute-type.description: Code describing the language used in the generated markup for this component

attribute-type.name: limitToList
attribute-type.description: If "true", updates on client side ONLY elements from this 'reRender' property. If "false" (default) updates all rendered by ajax region components

attribute-type.name: minChars
attribute-type.description: Minimal number of chars in input to activate suggestion pop-up

attribute-type.name: nothingLabel
attribute-type.description: "nothingLabel" is inserted to popup list if the autocomplete returns empty list. It isn't selectable and list is closed as always after click on it and nothing is put to input.

attribute-type.name: onbeforedomupdate

attribute-type.name: onsubmit

attribute-type.name: param

The styles are applied, in turn, to each row in the table. For example, if the list has two elements, the first style class in the list is applied to the first row, the second to the second row, the first to the third row, the second to the fourth row, etc. In other words, we keep iterating through the list until we reach the end, and then we start at the beginning again

attribute-type.name: rules
attribute-type.description:
This attribute specifies which rules will appear between cells within a table. The rendering of rules is user agent dependent. Possible values:
* none: No rules. This is the default value. * groups: Rules will appear between row groups (see THEAD, TFOOT, and TBODY) and column groups (see COLGROUP and COL) only. * rows: Rules will appear between rows only. * cols: Rules will appear between columns only. * all: Rules will appear between all rows and columns

element-type.name: toolBar
element-type.description: A horizontal bar with items on it. If you want to use it as a standard top tool bar, point to each item with a ch:menu "for" attribute to link the appropriate drop-down menu with the item id on a tool bar. "toolBar" accepts any JSF components as children. They appear from left to right in the definition order. The children are separated from each other basing on the value of the "itemSeparator" attribute. If you want to put the items along the right side for a menu bar, you can use the "toolBarGroup" component as a wrapper and define the "location" attribute there. The items inside the group can have their own separator. See the "toolBarGroup" component description for details.

element-type.description: The toolTip component is used for creation of event-triggered non modal popup, that contains information regarding the page element, that event was applied to.

attribute-type.name: attached
attribute-type.description: If the value of the "attached" attribute is true, a component is attached to the parent component; if false, component does not listen to activating browser events, but could be activated externally. Default value is "true".

attribute-type.description: The attribute takes a value-binding expression for a component property of a backing bean

attribute-type.description: If false the components is rendered on the client but JavaScript for calling disabled. Default value is "false".

attribute-type.description: Id of the target component.

attribute-type.description: Delay in milliseconds before tooltip will be hidden. Default value is "0".

attribute-type.description: Sets the horizontal offset between pop-up list and mouse pointer. Default value is "10".

attribute-type.description: Every component may have a unique id that is automatically created if omitted
